sk1.name: Purification
sk1.desc: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

sk2.name: Repel
sk2.desc: Creates a powerful divine ward that blocks most magic from affecting a target unit.

sk3.name: Degen Aura
sk3.desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near, including magic immune enemies.

sk4.name: Guardian Angel
sk4.desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage and greatly increases hit point regeneration of nearby allies.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
